formatDescription: The Stuffit Archive file format is a proprietary file compression format originally developed by Raymond Lau in 1987. It supports storing the Resource Fork alongside other files and is commonly used in Mac environments, though a Windows version has also been released.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints

internalSignatures.name: Stuffit Archive File Version 1.6-4.5
internalSignatures.note: BOF: 'StuffIt'{6}'rLau' followed by 02, the differentiator between version 1.5 (01) and version 1.6-4.5 (02).
